channel.title: +रामचन्द्रः on पुराणे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +रामचन्द्रः on पुराणे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: V1
item.description:
THE HILL - SHRINE OF VENGADAM Art, Architecture and Agama of Tirumala Temple By Prof. S.K. Ramachandra Rao SRI VIKHANAS TRUST # 27, Sri Vaikhanasa Ashramam Ring Road, Tirumala - 517 504. A.P. India. THE HILL-SHRINE OF VENGADAM ART, ARCHITECTURE AND AGAMA OF TIRUMALA TEMPLE ང་་་་་་༥ BRUKS An image of the hill-god, sculpted by Syamsundar Bhat of Bangalore on the basis of the author’s sketches and impression. निरुपमगुणसिन्धुर्नित्यलक्ष्मीसमेतो निखिलनिगमवेद्यो निस्तुलो वेङ्कटेशः । निजचरणसमर्चासक्तभक्तौघरक्षी निवसतु हृदये मे स्वांघ्रिभक्तिं वितन्वन् || THE HILL-SHRINE OF VENGADAM ART, ARCHITECTURE AND AGAMA OF TIRUMALA TEMPLE BY S.K. RAMACHANDRA RAO Sri VIKHANAS TRUST No. 27, Sri Vaikhanasa Ashramam Ring Road, Tirumala - 517 504 THE HILL-SHRINE OF VENGADAM, (Art, Architecture and Agama of Tirumala Temple) by Vidyalankara Sastra-chudamani Vedanta-nidhi, Sangita-Kalaratna Professor S.K. Ramachandra Rao, and published by Sri VIKHANAS TRUST, Tirumala - 517 504. First Edition: 1993 Kalpatharu Research Academy Revised Edition: 2010 Sri Vikhanas Trust, Tirumala. Sri Vikhanasa Trust Publications Series No.: 10 Price: Two Hundred and Fifty Only For Copies Secretary Sri Vikhanasa Trust No. 27 Sri Vaikhanasa Ashramam Ring Road, Tirumala - 517 504. A.P. India Ph: 0877-2277952, 09494209952 Printed by: Students Offset Printers, Tirupati Copies: 2000 1437 00 Preface Introduction
